languages.text: "Все здесь сочится бледно-зеленым. Этот оттенок... душит, словно цепь, стиснувшая горло".

traits.locale_text: "Все здесь сочится бледно-зеленым. Этот оттенок... душит, словно цепь, стиснувшая горло".

languages.text: "Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."
languages.original_text: "Все здесь сочится бледно-зеленым. Этот оттенок... душит, словно цепь, стиснувшая горло".

traits.locale_text: "Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."
"Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."

"Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."
"Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."

languages.text: 「ここにあるものすべてが青白い緑を滲ませています。この色…まるで首に巻きつく鎖のように、あたくしの息を奪います」
languages.original_text: "Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."

traits.locale_text: 「ここにあるものすべてが青白い緑を滲ませています。この色…まるで首に巻きつく鎖のように、あたくしの息を奪います」

languages.text: "Alles hier trieft nur so vor einem blassen Grün. Diese Farbe ... sie erwürgt mich wie eine Kette um meine Kehle."
languages.original_text: "Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."

traits.locale_text: "Alles hier trieft nur so vor einem blassen Grün. Diese Farbe ... sie erwürgt mich wie eine Kette um meine Kehle."

languages.text: « Tout ici suinte un vert pâle. Cette couleur... Elle m'étrangle comme une chaîne autour de ma gorge. »
languages.original_text: "Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ici suinte un vert pâle. Cette couleur... Elle m'étrangle comme une chaîne autour de ma gorge. »

languages.text: «Todo lo que hay aquí rezuma un color pálido verdoso... Me estrangula como si tuviese una cadena en torno al cuello».
languages.original_text: "Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."

traits.locale_text: «Todo lo que hay aquí rezuma un color pálido verdoso... Me estrangula como si tuviese una cadena en torno al cuello».

languages.text: “这里的一切都在渗着惨淡的绿色。这种颜色……就像锁链一样扼住了我的喉咙。”
languages.original_text: "Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."

traits.locale_text: “这里的一切都在渗着惨淡的绿色。这种颜色……就像锁链一样扼住了我的喉咙。”

languages.text: "Her yer yemyeşil. Bu rengi görünce boğazım düğümleniyor, boğulacak gibi oluyorum."
languages.original_text: "Everything here is seeping pale green. This colour... it strangles me like a chain around my throat."

traits.locale_text: "Her yer yemyeşil. Bu rengi görünce boğazım düğümleniyor, boğulacak gibi oluyorum."
